blur_detection.description: The image is clear with sharp text and well-defined edges throughout the invoice.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed as the image quality is sufficient for text recognition.

contrast_assessment.description: The contrast between the text and background is strong with black text on white/light gray backgrounds.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No adjustment needed as contrast is sufficient for OCR processing.

glare_identification.description: No glare or reflections are visible in the image that would impact text recognition.
glare_identification.recommendation: No action needed as the image is free from glare issues.

water_stains.description: No water stains, discoloration or moisture damage is visible on the document.
water_stains.recommendation: No action needed as the document appears clean and undamaged by water.

tears_or_folds.description: No tears, creases, or folds are visible in the digital invoice document.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: No action needed as the document appears to be a digital copy without physical damage.

cut_off_detection.description: All edges of the invoice are visible with no content being cut off from the frame.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: No adjustment needed as the full document is captured in the image.

missing_sections.description: The invoice appears complete with all essential sections present including header, order details, delivery information, and pricing.
missing_sections.recommendation: No action needed as all standard invoice sections appear to be included.

obstructions.description: No obstructions such as fingers, shadows, or objects are covering any part of the document.
obstructions.recommendation: No action needed as the document is free from obstructions.
